title: Any team B3 to Gold 3 that needs a support?
body:
Looking to find either a team or a duo to try and climb a bit -  was B3 before but due to bad match ups ended up back to B5... :(

Anyone that plays on a semi-regular basis? as in.. nights and some time during the weekend?

add me, same name IG

cheers

replies.body:
I'm looking for a support for my ranked team. I'm silver 5, add me if you wanna join 
M Zadows
